title: 820-00165 (25mA with a quick flash of 100mA)  Flying Blind!
message:
This board is Tricky for me.  The flash of 100mA is caused by the brief 1/10 sec turn on of U3900.  U3900 is on for just a split second and no thermal signatures out of the normal are detected. 
PP3V3_S0 is never present during this cycle.  
25 Mhz clock is present
3V3 enable flashes but only to 0.5v along the same time line as U3900.

I feel like a newbie asking for help on this board.   But I am flat stuck.

title: 820-00165 (25mA with a quick flash of 100mA)  Flying Blind!
message:
Diode mode to ground on 3V3_S0 rail?
Check for pulse with o-scope.
It can also show if enable signal reaches 3V peak...
